Posts.Content: Oct 13, 2018 12:27PM Gee_3440 wrote: Stage 4 Metastatic Breast Cancer that has spread to the brain. This is year 2 for me. In between medical appointments, taking care of my 3 kids and maintaining my household, I started looking for resources. I discovered there is a big divide between the Breast Cancer multi-billion-dollar industry and support and funding for patients actually living and dying with the actual disease. I'd like to see that change.
